column2: "Yo <%me>? What do you have your guard up for? It's not like I'm going to kill you yet."
"Sheena is somewhere, injured. I guess that leaves me to do whatever I want. It feels great!"
"Other people are just pawns to use and throw away if they're not useful. Don't you think?"
"You don't? Fine think what ever you want."
"But don't forget, you're just a pawn to ARKS. There are lots of others to replace you!"
